name: Drill Stage
description:
In DRILL STAGE, you have no timer and only 30 seconds allowed to reach the bottom. Use your wits and best decision-making skills to drill through the colorful blocks, while also avoiding the black blocks and the debris spawned by all blocks.

SPECIAL THANKS:
Aseprite: For helping me create all of the sprites.
Prof.Mudkip: For the 8-bit explosion sound. (Link: https://freesound.org/people/Prof.Mudkip/sounds/386862/)

This game is also compatible with PS4 controllers. The controls for PS4 controllers are:

Left joystick: Move
Square: Drill
X: Jump
